name: Flagger (Aces Games)
description:
Flagger is a basic web based quiz game, where you simply need to guess a collection of flags from all over the world. Some flags might seem familiar to you and others you probably have never seen before.

  • Compete against your friends up to 4 players or play solo to educate yourself about flags.
  • The default flag pool includes over 200 flags from the whole world.

The game is best viewed in full screen 1920 x 1080. Other resolutions may skew the UI.

Coming Soon

The flag pool can also be determined customly by the player, based on the regions of the world.
